text: Jimma, also known as Jima in Italian Gimma is a city found on the southwest of Ethiopia and is also the largest city found in southwestern Ethiopia. The population of Jimma was 159,009 as of the 2005 census. Jimma is found in the Oromia Region of Ethiopia. The city also has a university named Jimma University and an airport. == Other websites == *Archive of the Jimma website Category:Cities in Ethiopia
title: Jimma
